item.description:
Master Key System Study Group.

We are having an optional in-person meetup for the Master Key Study Group this week. For those who are able, you are encouraged to meet at my loft in Boston at 7pm for a discussion of the chapter. We will then join the regularly scheduled Telephone Meetup at 9pm. Please RSVP if you are joining us at the Loft at 7pm

This night, we'll be discussing Lesson 5.

** Please take the time to read Lesson 5, do the activities and be ready to discuss & share.


When:
Monday, November 12, 2007 ; 7:00 - 9:00 PM
Monday, November 12, 2007 ; 9:00 - 10:00 PM

Where:
7pm - 107 South Street, Suite 6A
9pm - TELEPHONE - 605-990-0700 x 1081150 #

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Master Key System TELE-Study Group
